articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Adobe explains why it abandoned the Figma deal - The Verge
articles.description: In an interview with Nilay Patel on Decoder, Adobe general counsel Dana Rao says that the company couldn’t prove to European regulators that its now-scuttled Figma acquisition wouldn’t harm future competition.
articles.content:
Adobe explains why it abandoned the Figma deal
Adobe explains why it abandoned the Figma deal
 / Adobes general counsel shares more about the decision.
ByJay Peters, a news editor who writes about… [+2412 chars]
